Convert image to text with our free OCR software
Aspose.OCR is a free online OCR service that allows converting scanned images of popular formats like JPG, BMP, TIFF, GIF, PNG to plain editable text.
Convert image to text with our free OCR software
Just upload your images to convert image to text for JPG, BMP, TIFF, GIF, PNG, EMF, SVG formats.
How to Scan Image using Aspose.OCR Scan Image App
Click inside the file drop area to upload file or drag & drop file.
Your file will be uploaded to scan.
Wait until the recognition result displayed.
Upload your image and click on “Perform OCR” button to convert image to text. You will get the text as soon as the OCR is performed
It works from all platforms including Windows, Mac, Android and iOS. All files are processed on our servers. No plugin or software installation required for you
. All files are processed using Aspose APIs, which are being used by many Fortune 100 companies across 114 countries
